document.full_text: with its decision on the hiring law that arizona passed in 2007, the supreme court indicated that it would not completely disallow any action by states on immigration enforcement.
document.title: news analysis: justices' arizona ruling on illegal immigration may embolden states
lines_and_colors: with its decision on the hiring law that arizona passed in 2007, the supreme court indicated that it would not completely disallow any action by states on immigration enforcement.
